    • Method Detail

      • merge

        void merge(NumericHistogram other)

      • add

        void add(double v)
        Parameters:
        v - The data point to add to the histogram approximation.

      • quantile

        double quantile(double q)
        Gets an approximate quantile value from the current histogram. Some popular quantiles are 0.5 (median), 0.95, and 0.98.
        Parameters:
        q - The requested quantile, must be strictly within the range (0,1).
        Returns:
        The quantile value.

      • cdf

        double cdf(double val)
        Returns the fraction of all points added which are <= x.
        Returns:
        the cumulative distribution function (cdf) result

      • sum

        double sum(double val,
           boolean inclusive)
        Estimate number of values consumed up to provided value.
        Parameters:
        val -
        Returns:
        the number of estimated points

      • bufferSize

        int bufferSize()
        Returns:
        the amount of byte buffer space to serialize this histogram
